p: Triazole 4a or 4b (442 mg or 498 mg, 1.00 mmol) was dissolved in dichloromethane (5 ml) and NBS (178 mg, 1.00 mmol) was added. The mixture was stirred at rt for 2.5 h, the solvent was then evaporated off and the crude product was purified by flash chromatography with EtOAc/hexane = 30/70 as eluent.
